name: Sorceress Free
description:
An exciting new way to play solitaire... with potions!
Potions let you burn cards, shuffle stacks, and more.

Features include:
-2 Fun and Helpful Potions
-3 Solitaire Games
-Retina graphics, including support for the new iPad.
-Fun sound effects and special effects.
-Detailed Help

Upgrade via an in-app purchase to unlock undo, 2 extra potions, and 4 extra games...
